Articles.Content:
I think it'd be awesome to have different galaxys to explore, Other than kerbol!

Like even the milky way.

Hello Bearsh. Since a galaxy ranges in size from millions to hundreds of billions of solar systems, that would be pretty ambitious to add to KSP. I think you meant solar systems of one star with a few planets? However, there are some subjects which have been discussed so endlessly that they've been added to a list of What Not to Suggest because there is little new that can be said about them, and this is one of them. We like to keep our discussions moving, so please look that over before suggesting other subjects which might be on the list. (Thread closed.)
